cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Combine the whiskey, syrup, and bitters in a mixing glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with ice. Stir until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain the drink into a rocks glass filled with ice (or one large cube). Garnish with an expressed orange twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: Combine the whiskey, vermouth, and bitters in a mixing glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with ice. Stir until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain the drink into a coupe or martini glass and garnish with a high-quality cocktail cherry
